channel.title: Please Help!
channel.description:
On emotes i have the cry etc.... but i Cant see what they do e.g. i can click on one of those tabs but i cant see the "cry"
also i want to remove right click deul and remove right click stats and add kick, and ban but i cant do it ive tried loads of times please help?
one more thing how can i press on an npc and make them talk?
